CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 16 reads: "2. For the sixth straight year, the Best Foods Inc. offered a new refreshing idea in booth displays. Mrs. Mabel B. Mills, perennial hostess, and William A. Waldron great homemakers"
TitMainTitle: Mabel B. Mills and William A. Waldron standing in Best Foods, Inc. booth with sandwich bar display in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
